briefTitle: Effectiveness of Atomoxetine in Treating ADHD Symptoms in Children and Adolescents With Autism
officialTitle: Targeted Pharmacologic Interventions for Autism: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Trial of Atomoxetine in Children and Adolescents With Autism
summary: This study will evaluate the effectiveness of atomoxetine in treating children with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder symptoms associated with autistic disorder, Asperger's syndrome, and pervasive developmental disorder, not otherwise specified.

primaryOutcome.measure: ADHD Rating Scale (ADHDRS)-Home Version Total Score (Randomized Phase)
